author: Natasha David
description: Banana fruitiness subtly flavours and lightens a base of rye whiskey and cognac with absinthe adding delicate anise notes.
name: Bananarac
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
2.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR absinthe into chilled glass and swirl to coat (rinse) inside and set aside
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into absinthe-rinsed glass (without ice)
